medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute respiratory distress and seizures post cleft palate repair.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms developed 14 hours post-operatively, initially presenting as stable vital signs followed by acute respiratory distress and posturing, culminating in a seizure.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Cleft lip and palate repair history; prior lip adhesion at 2 weeks and definitive lip and nose repair at 4 months old; uncomplicated birth and normal development.
medical_history.family_history: Significant for a maternal great-grandfather and maternal grandfather who both died suddenly at relatively young ages from unknown causes.
